Author: ismail9001
Title: [ANN]DeNet - Future of the Internet through the lens of decentralization
Body: DeNet launches bug bounty in DeNet.Storage  DeNet will pay rewards for detected holes in the security of DeNet.Storage, a data storage service.  We will gratify any person who informs us about the bugs which can lead to a cyber breach or information anonymity corruption.  Rewards measures  Remote Code Execution from 5 714 DNET tokens (200 USD) for minor bugs to 142 857 tokens (5 000 USD) for great holes  MITM from 7 143 DNET tokens (250 USD)  CSRF from 7 143 DNET tokens (250 USD)  Unauthorized access from 286 DNET tokens (10 USD). In case if a possibility to access someone else‚Äôs files detected‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääfrom 142 857 Dnet tokens (5 000 USD)  If any other holes are detected‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääfrom 100 DNET tokens (3.5 USD). The reward measure depends on the bug severity and reports quality. The reward goes to the first person informing about a hole after its confirmed. Withdrawals are available for balance more than 50 tokens.  How to participate  To participate in the bug bounty‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääsend a message about bugs to a telegram bot @DeNetBugBountybot and follow the instruction.  Your application status information is available in ‚ÄúMy reports‚Äù. To know about the reward credited you can in your application profile. We will publish the report about the corrected bugs, programme participants and reward measures weekly.  DeNet.Storage is a decentralized data storage. Pieces of information are encrypted and allocated to multiple independent hubs. To avoid a cyber breach and provide security of data blockchain technology is used. With the help of DeNet.Storage is easy to maintain personal and commercial data protection and to reduce expenses for the storage of large information volumes. The login system includes a private key and ECDSA digital signatures that guarantees anonymity and safety.  Follow our news at your convenience: https://medium.com/@denetpro https://www.reddit.com/user/DeNetPro

Author: ismail9001
Title: [ANN]DeNet - Future of the Internet through the lens of decentralization
Body: We launched an application to rent a hard drive.  Today there are about 4 billion computers with over 500 Exabyte of free space in the world. If all those capacities are placed on USB flash drives of 64 gigabyte each, one can lay a road to the Moon!  DeNet suggests to more rationally use these resources. The company creates a decentralized eco-system using blockchain-technologies for data storage, hosting of websites and applications and other computational tasks. DeNet solutions, based on a concept of sharing economy, will let millions of people all over the world not only rent out idle capacities of their computers and earn on it, but become part of a global society, influencing development of data storage technology.  To join DeNet network (https://denet.pro/denet-node/), you need a PC with 256 Mb RAM and internet with a speed of 1 mbit/s minimum. Now the application works on Linux and Mac OS.  Cloud storage market volume grows by almost 30 % per year and will approach about USD 100 billion by 2022. Several major players, such as Dropbox, Google, Yandex and Mail.ru, own the market now.  If a decentralized storage can capture even a small percentage of this market, it will be a big industry. Today DeNet, Storj, Sia, Filecoin, Substratum and more are already competing for share of this market. Different platforms work differently. But regardless of the approach, decentralized storage is a rapidly growing industry and the future is promising for any project that can improve the technology.  To prove the idea‚Äôs operability, in the end of 2017 DeNet presented an alpha-version of a shared static hosting; and a pre-beta version of DeNet.Storage ‚Äì in July 2018. The final versions will be released in 2019.

Author: ismail9001
Title: [ANN]DeNet - Future of the Internet through the lens of decentralization
Body: OUR PRESALE STARTED  We are going to talk about current results of the development, conditions of token sale that started on October 1st, 2018, and our future plans. One year has passed since we stepped on DeNet path. Do you remember how in 2017 we launched the first version of HTTP distributed hosting‚Ää‚Äî‚Äähttps://alpha.denet.pro/  We worked hard to achieve the goals we specified in RoadMap during this year. And this is what we have by now:  - Own Ethereum Testnet - Micro-payments on blockchain - Updated smart-contracts of tasks - Own protocol of communication between nodes - Beta-version of DeNet.Storage data storage that is anonymous, safe and cheap‚Ää‚Äî‚Äähttps://storage.denet.pro/landing/  Each member of a network can upload his data to a distributed network of miners: DeNet.Storage. Registration is very simple: create a new account or import an existing one. No logins, email and more. Only a private key that is kept in your browser.  Node App Alpha-version‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääan app for renting capacities out (available for Linux and Mac OS. Windows-version is on the way)‚Ää‚Äî‚Äähttps://denet.pro/denet-node/  Now you can install a node for mining DNET tokens and become a public/verifying node within DeNet network. You need a PC with 256 Mb RAM and internet with a speed of 1 Mbit/s minimum. Now a public app is available for Mac OS, versions for Linux and Windows are on their way. Join us, earn on idle capacities of your computer, and become part of DeNet community!  So what?  Now we have an app for miners and an app for users; that‚Äôs why we work on expanding the audience and improvement of services for DNET token is used as much as possible within our network.  Why does it matter?  Tokens value increases with growing demand on services within DeNet network. It means that the same amount of tokens will let you get more services tomorrow than it used to be yesterday.  For example:  DeNet network turnover in petabytes‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääup to 300 How many TB you can store for 300 tokens per month? Up to 10. Up to 3,000‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääup to 100.  Buy tokens now: when we develop a turnover of 3,000 petabytes, you will be able to get ten times more capacities than today.  Take part in fundraising  We spare no effort to make private and safe data storage available to everyone. Join token sale to support us and become part of DeNet community.  Our presale started at 9:00 am GMT on October 1st, 2018‚Ää‚Äî‚Äähttps://denet.pro/fund/.  Our goal  The goal of this stage of token sale is to raise funds for further improvement of the development, full-fledged launch of services on the scheduled date and entry in South Korean and Russian markets.  Conditions of token sale  There is no minimum entry threshold. The exchange rate is fixed at the moment of payment. Maximum threshold: USD 100,000 (if above USD 100,000‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääyou become a participant of a closed presale and receive bonuses)  The main token sale will be different: without regular bonuses. The bonus system will be used only during the October presale. The further token sale will be presented in a new way‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääwe will inform you about it in detail later on.  We offer the most advantageous conditions for tokens purchase to participants of a closed presale that is going on now. Contact us to get a personal offer: r@denet.pro or in telegram @SIRafik. Private sale conditions are valid until the end of October 2018.  Check for updates on our website and in social networks, invite your friends to join DeNet network!

Author: drays
Title: [ANN]DeNet - Future of the Internet through the lens of decentralization
Body: Project looks quite interesting, but I have few questions:  1. Where can I see the source code of the project? Is it open-sourced? I assume it is closed, to keep the know-how from competitors, right?  2. If source code is not available, then how you can guarantee the storage is indeed 100% decentralized - how you can prove those files are not kept on your local data center storage 100% private - how you can prove you do not have backdoor key to every single file on the storage? 100% safe - how you can prove the integrity of the data is guaranteed, even if multiple hosting computers will switch off  So the bottomline - with closed-source code there is no way to audit it, so why users should trust you? Or... are there legal guarantees (instead of open-code-based ones), as with existing centralized storage solutions?  I am not trying to be mean. I just want to understand if there are mechanisms to prove your claims, as the project itself sounds promising, and those questions may arise during its way to mainstream.

Title: [ANN]DeNet - Future of the Internet through the lens of decentralization
Body: Dear friends, After discussion with DeNet community, we ready to announce new dates of our pre-sale and token sale. Start of pre-sale ‚Äî 1st of October 2018. That‚Äôs why: - By this time, we will greatly improve our product. You will get more stable, relevant and functional version of DeNet.Storage (for instance, implementation of smart contracts to the platform for rent, test of rating system of nodes, work with several master nodes e.t.c); - We will attract more users and partners in order to test our product in the field. This will allow us to refine our products in accordance with real market needs and to get relevant data for the development; If hard cap not reached, main stage will be in November, 1. Token distribution - within a week after the end of the sale (until December, 7). We will fix the best exchange rate between 1st of June and 1st of October crypto/usd to all 3 day presale contributors. As a bonus for waiting, all participants will get tokens of a more stable and reliable company with a ready-to-go solution. Author: ismail9001
Title: [ANN]DeNet - Future of the Internet through the lens of decentralization
Body: DeNet is going to implement the EmerCoin payment system which relieves transactions speed and number limits  DeNet will be the first company to implement RandPay‚Äôs micropayment system to its services. For the first time ever, an unlimited number of transactions on a decentralized Network, will be possible.  So far, the number of payments on the Bitcoin network is limited to 7 transactions per second and 16+ transactions on Ethereum network. Transaction times could grow depending on how many requests there are and can range from a few minutes to a few hours.  ¬´RandPay makes blockchain transactions faster, relieves its number limits and reduces fees ‚Äì said Emercoin CTO Oleg Khovayko. ‚Äî Also, RandPay is simple to integrate and is very secure¬ª.  DeNet is working on developing an alternative decentralized storage service and has already submitted an alpha-version of decentralized static hosting and a pre-beta version of the secure data service DeNet.Storage.  DeNet rents free capacities from users all over the world, and allows those users to earn money by leasing.  ¬´Implementing RandPay in DeNet services enables payment for each capacity unit. Meeting with Emercoin co-founder Stan Polozov pushed us to conclude a partnership with the company. Emercoin has technology, we have services where we can implement this technology¬ª, ‚Äî said DeNet CO-founder and CTO Denis Shelestov.  In the future, technology will allow for the verification of files and the deployment of full hosting for different services, whose business model involves distributed storage of data.  DeNet will accelerate network scaling and Emercoin is going to make its ecosystem a valuable member of the new market.  About DeNet:  DeNet ‚Äì is an international provider company that is developing a blockchain based platform, which unites computers and servers all over the world into a network to provide decentralized web hosting services, as well as safe and secure data storage and data processing. The company aims to create decentralized hosting and routing plans, DNS and other network elements from a centralized ownership, ensuring autonomy of the network. DeNet was one of the first to test its minimum viable product (alpha-version on public test since November 2017).  Please visit https://denet.pro  for more information.  About Emercoin  Emercoin is an emerging leader in secure, distributed blockchain business services. The interoperability of blockchain technologies provides us a holistic view that can effectively be used in both real and virtual world problems. And that‚Äôs exactly what Emercoin (EMC) is doing. Emercoin offers a wide range of services and solutions based on blockchain technology for many industries.  Contact for more information: Renata Aripova marketing@denet.pro +7 (921) 883 09 98

Author: ismail9001
Title: [ANN]DeNet - Future of the Internet through the lens of decentralization
Body: Whole last month we`ve been working on improving the service. So what's new in DeNet?  DeNet is working on development of alternative decentralized storage services and already submitted pre-beta version of secure data service DeNet.Storage. In July we offered all those who wish to test it (you can try it too if still not: https://storage.denet.pro/landing/).  We`ve got a feedback: reviews, observations and suggestions from our colleague, advisers and common users. So, whole last month we`ve been working on improving the service. We`ve updated a website architecture, the frontend-version and have increased storage‚Äôs security.  To do list:  Storage landing: storage.denet.pro/landing  DeNet.Storage update Usability Authorization Creating folders Previews  Front-end:  Private keys encryption and decryption by passwords Fast search  Overall updates:  Files fragmentation and defragmentation Rating system Digital signatures  Usability  It`s hard to get used to something new. Usually people do not want to spend time for learning about something. Therefore we made Denet.Storage functionary and design are intuitive. You can load into the storage any files you want. Unlike traditional services, nobody can get access to your data or use it (even us).  Frontend  We`ve implemented Vue.js framework and increased the working speed.  We constantly analyze new technologies and implement the most effective in our service. We want to make its interface handy and secure.  For instance, we made files preview. It is common for traditional services, but new for blockchain one. Now it is generating on backend. In next versions they are going to be generated and encrypted only in frontend.  There are folders to make file organization more convenient.  Backend  We`ve upgraded signing up system with the help of public and private keys. We abandoned the signing up form with Metamask, because it could limit us in future.  What private key allows us in frontend? Digital signature generation regardless of other apps To approve transactions between user and node in the background To download files directly from slave-nodes Appropriate account switching We`ve developed and have tested a library for files fragmentation and defragmentation, which will be implemented in next versions. This is the next step towards end-state product vision.  Moreover we`ve developed and have tested nodes rating system, which we are going to implement in upcoming upgrades.  Decentralization  By the way, we believe that it`s not good to get carried away by blockchain in projects. The reason is in limits. But what we should do when we have to build an independent network without those limits? While developing DeNet we learned each fact and can offer several solutions to avoid limits. We will definitely write about it. Stay tuned!

Author: Makleyhill
Title: [ANN]DeNet - Future of the Internet through the lens of decentralization
Body: Today developers‚Äô team launched a new powerful version of DeNet.Storage (https://lnkd.in/d3GSKFn ). In just 5 months, without huge investments our small company made a big step towards restoring the rights of online anonymity and the security of personal data from third parties. No more emails and other personal info when you want to authorize ‚Äì only private key and you are IN. All inquiries are protected with an ECDSA digital signature, which ensures heightened security. Also check out other important functional changes in the Storage: - Denet.storage now has folders, so you can sort their data into different folders and access them quickly. Our storage looks just the same as traditional storage services with one significant difference - all of your data is now safe and protected; - Implemented tiled view of all files in the Storage ‚Äì traditional and comfortable for you; - Refined user-friendly interface ‚Äì for instance, now you can see image previews; - Work on design in order to make it even more comfortable and likeable than before Became first who tested it for free and leave your feedback! P.S: Starting next week, everyone who find bugs in service will get valuable prizes from developing team. https://www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:6419585341727997953

Author: ismail9001
Title: [ANN]DeNet - Future of the Internet through the lens of decentralization
Body: DeNet proves the cybersecurity of its blockchain-based decentralized platform for data-storage and hosting with Naoris technology  DeNet is going to prove the sustainability of its products with the help of the world‚Äôs first holistic blockchain-based cybersecurity platform, Naoris. This test will be a key feature in DeNet‚Äôs global strategy, which focuses on security guarantees for its platform and for every user in the DeNet network.  Naoris‚Äô vision is to revolutionize the way in which cybersecurity is thought about and delivered around the world. Its infinitely scalable platform, the Naoris Security Ecosystem (Naoris SE), leverages the unique benefits of blockchain technologies and the latest in artificial intelligence (AI) to offer near-instantaneous detection and reporting of cyber threats, facilitating a consensually approved fix action without the need to rely on a central point of failure to command changes. Naoris‚Äô technology is a perfect solution for DeNet‚Äôs ecosystem for data storage and web-hosting.  Naoris will examine DeNet‚Äôs durability and will prove that decentralized services are much safer than any existing centralized solution. A team of industry professionals, led by David Carvalho, an experienced Global Chief Information Security Officer, will audit DeNet‚Äôs platform accordingly until December 2018.  ‚ÄúOur supreme goal is to provide everyone with a safe, reliable and completely secure network for global data hosting and storage. By applying Naoris‚Äô real-time anonymous tamper-proof assurance into the DeNet system, we are bringing a powerful solution that proves an unprecedented level of security for our data-storage and web-hosting platform, while ensuring maximum trust on the system‚Äù‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääsays Rafik Singatullin, CEO DeNet.  At the moment DeNet has two minimum viable working products, which demonstrate the functionality and usability of decentralized blockchain-based system. Users are able to test DeNet.Storage and alpha-version of web-hosting at their official site. The company is constantly working on developing and improving its products and plans to roll out ready-to-go products by 2019. Naoris will provide a senior inspection, which will help DeNet build a powerful system of trust.  ‚ÄúWe are seeing that the blockchain, for the first time ever, is reimagining cybersecurity and addressing the recurring defect in current solutions of a single central point of failure within growing networks. Current cloud networks are increasingly susceptible to cyber intrusions for companies holding vast amounts of user data. Therefore, robust cybersecurity solutions are crucial for companies such as DeNet, as its data storage and hosting capabilities expand.  We are pleased to sign this agreement with DeNet, a decentralized blockchain platform whose vision is complementary to Naoris. We are undertaking a comprehensive audit in order to support the considerable cybersecurity requirements of DeNet‚Äôs platform. We look forward to working together with DeNet and continuing to grow our relationship‚Äù‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääsays David Carvalho, Founder & CEO Naoris.  About DeNet:  DeNet‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääis an international provider company that is developing a blockchain based platform, which unites computers and servers all over the world into a network to provide decentralized web hosting services, as well as safe and secure data storage and data processing. The company aims to create decentralized hosting and routing plans, DNS and other network elements from a centralized ownership, ensuring autonomy of the network. DeNet was one of the first to test its minimum viable product (alpha-version on public test since November 2017). Please visit https://denet.pro for more information.  About Naoris:  Launched in 2018, Naoris is the world‚Äôs first holistic blockchain-based cybersecurity platform. Its objective is to move cybersecurity to the next level and redefine the way it is thought about and delivered. By leveraging the benefits of blockchain-based technologies and AI, Naoris delivers hyper-resilience, hyper-detection and hyper-response. For the first time, the larger a network grows, the more secure is becomes.  At its core Naoris has developed proprietary technologies to create its platform, Naoris Security Ecosystem (Naoris SE), which is infinitely scalable and agnostic to device or operating system.  Naoris‚Äô management team and advisory board are made up of proven blue-chip cyber security and blockchain experts with an in-depth knowledge of the issues that governments, organisations and individuals face.
